page.title: 14Tibberton Playgroup
page.content:
The playgroup started in{l973}and {twenty four children}aged between two and a half and five years go to it.
The sessions are held on{Tuesdays, {Thursdays}and{Fridays,}from nine in the morning until twelve o'clock mid- day. The{mother and toddler}club is combined with the Fridays session,this was only formed a year ago.
The cost is{fifty pence}a day. The playschool has lots of toys. There is a{committee}to organize dances, jumble sales etc., to raise money for new equipment and for milk. Every session the group is{helped by a different {mother.
Sometimes the children are taken on{outings}to such places as a zoo, the seaside, a day on a farm etc.
